metadata.title: CVE-2020-24330 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in TrouSerS through 0.3.14. If the tcsd daemon is started with root privileges instead of by the tss user, it fails to drop the root gid privilege when no longer needed.

notes.note: mdeslaur> the Debian/Ubuntu package starts tcsd as the tss user, not as root, so this issue doesn't affect default configurations

criterions.comment: trousers package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
